alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 3:51PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Wakulla and northeastern Franklin Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 351 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of St. Marks to 13 miles southwest of Crawfordville. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sopchoppy, Alligator Point, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Bald Point, Panacea-Wakulla Airport, Mcintyre, Panacea, Shell Point, Wakulla Beach, Buckhorn, Spring Creek, Liveoak Island and Curtis Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Wakulla
